RANDOMTARGET.Name: Random Target
RANDOMTARGET.MissingSceneError: You need to have an active scene to select random targets
RANDOMTARGET.MinimumSelectionError: You need to select at least 2 tokens
RANDOMTARGET.MinimumCategoriesError: You need to select at least 1 category

CloseAfterSelection.Name: Close after selection
CloseAfterSelection.Hint: Specifies whether the target selection window should close after a target is chosen.

ChatNotifications.Name: Chat notifications
ChatNotifications.Hint: Specifies whether a chat message should be sent when a random target is selected, and what the privacy level should be.

AvoidSelectingSameTarget.Name: Avoid selecting the same target
AvoidSelectingSameTarget.Hint: Specifies whether the same target should be prevented from being selected twice in a row.

PreferredTargetImage.Name: Preferred target image
PreferredTargetImage.Hint: Specifies the preferred image to display in the list of targets.

Categories.SettingHint: Choose which category filters to make available. At least one category must be selected. You can drag to rearrange their order.

Targets.Label: Targets
Targets.Description: Lists the targeted tokens in the scene

Selection.Label: Selection
Selection.Description: Lists the selected tokens in the scene

All.Label: All
All.Description: Lists all tokens in the scene
